name: Colonial Pipeline Ransomware Attack
summary: DarkSide ransomware affiliate gained access to Colonial Pipeline's IT network through a compromised VPN password. The attack led to a precautionary shutdown of the largest fuel pipeline in the US, causing widespread fuel shortages across the East Coast.

attack_phases.name: Initial Access via Compromised VPN
attack_phases.description: Attackers gained access using a compromised VPN account password. The account was no longer in active use but still had VPN access without MFA enabled.
detection_opportunities: VPN authentication from new geographic location

attack_phases.name: Network Reconnaissance
attack_phases.description: Attackers performed reconnaissance to understand network topology, identify high-value systems, and locate sensitive data for exfiltration.

attack_phases.name: Credential Harvesting
attack_phases.description: Attackers harvested credentials to enable lateral movement and domain-wide access.

attack_phases.name: Data Exfiltration
attack_phases.description: Approximately 100 GB of data exfiltrated before ransomware deployment as part of double extortion strategy.

attack_phases.name: Ransomware Deployment
attack_phases.description: DarkSide ransomware deployed to IT network. Colonial Pipeline shut down OT network as precaution despite it not being directly affected.

darkside_general.note: Specific IOCs from this incident not fully disclosed

response_actions.description: Colonial proactively shut down pipeline operations as precaution
Colonial paid 75 Bitcoin (~$4.4M) to obtain decryptor
US declared state of emergency to address fuel shortages
DOJ recovered 63.7 Bitcoin (~$2.3M) from DarkSide wallet

darkside_aftermath.reason: Law enforcement pressure following Colonial incident

lessons_learned: MFA is critical for all remote access
Incident response plans must include OT considerations
Ransom recovery is possible with law enforcement cooperation
regulatory_response: TSA issued security directives for pipeline operators
Executive Order on Improving Nation's Cybersecurity
